title: elevenia Mart
Is A Self-Managed Mini Convenient Marketplace.
home_slider.desc: We provide convenient solution for our partners and customers with support from our proprietary technology and core business relations

content.title: What is elevenia Mart?
content.desc: We’ve actually already asked hundreds of women what they want, and made a database with the results. All you have to do is take our short survey that only takes seconds, and our proprietary algorithm will match you with a few perfect gift options.

content.title: Our System
content.desc: We’ve actually already asked hundreds of people what they want, and made a database with the results.

list.title: Fully Managed
desc: We’ll take care of everything. From deliveries, restocking, product selection, even service needs.
We set it, you just enjoy the service.

list.title: Convenience & Efficient
desc: We place stores right where you are. Close to your customer, easy reach, and expandable.
Serve your customer anytime, any day for as long as you want.

list.title: Cashier-Less
desc: We have a self-managed solution, means no need to provide extra resources!
We also make payment available through ALL e-wallet using QRIS (GoPay, OVO, Dana, Link Aja, Sakuku, iSaku, etc.).

list.title: Artificial Intelligence Driven
desc: We operate using machine learning algorithm. It'll automatically manage sales, stock replenishment, & provide competitive pricing.
We will adapt to your needs.

list.title: Curated Products
desc: We will provide the best products for you. We have various products, from snacks, beverages, cable charger, and even power banks.
Our AI will evolve overtime based on your customer’s behaviour.

list.title: Dashboard
desc: We provide transparency, so you can see your performance at any time through our dashboard.
